Kup/Perceptor/hydras/Darkhawk/nighlight:

Kup ran to all the speed towards =
the battlefield while he opened his comlink to Tucson "Tucson I'm on my way=
, what's teh situation and what do you want i do?"

***********************=
******

Hydras was really mad this time and opening his comlink he said to =
this crew "We are under attack!!!!! We must to capture Nightshift, pronto!!=
!! Scourge and Cyclonus active the inner and exterior defenses... If the Au=
tobot leaves the base we will be forced to go to a fight"he send a secret m=
essage to Rodimus Prime "cover the reseach lab, if the autobot ran towards =
it, intercept him"

Dark hawk continue pursuing Nightshift without stop to =
shoot.

****************************

Nightlight just awoke to a nightmare,=
 she heard the alarms and was worry for Rodimus; Perceptor looking at her, =
said "Hide here, you will be safe inside this" then a sort of panic Room ap=
peared inside the Reseach complex

"But Rodimus..."

"He can care himself"s=
narled the predacon while he give her a gun "If the door opens and you see =
a bot that wasnt me, Rodimus or lord hydras use this"

She nodded scared wh=
ile the door of the Panic room closed hidding her inside


From: Sandy 
Sen=
t: Thursday, April 08, 2010 9:35 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re=
: BlackFortress


  
Nightshift was as well intuned with his senses as was =
Tucson. He had learned it in Ninjabot training. He could hear the hum of th=
e stunner beam and like Tucson, he maneuvers quickly, with a quick squat, d=
ucking himself lower than the beam, allowing it to go right over his head. =
He was fast in his motions, perhaps just slightly faster than Tucson, but i=
t was still hard to tell. He wastes no time in transforming and alternates =
between SUV mode and Robot mode to manuever away from his captives. 

"Slag=
, talk about a baaad day." 

Outside, now not far from the black fortress, =
going as fast as his wheels will carry him, Tucson Prime rushes to get to h=
is comrade who still struggles to get out of the fortress in one piece. Rat=
 Trap anxiously prepares for arrival as does Quickstride who loads up his c=
annons anticipating a good fight.

"Y'know, I think you should let them kno=
w you're comming, Sir. That should stir things up a bit."

Tucson gives Qui=
ckstride's suggestion deep thought.

" Actually, that's not a bad idea. Why=
 didn't I think of that?"

Rat Trap grins, and points to his massive horn.
=

" Well, you're a big truck, and big trucks have big loud horns.. C'mon let=
's hear it, I bet that'll really shake 'em up."

Tucson picks up speed as h=
e nears the fortress. And then, lets loose his horn, which blasts through t=
he air, creating a vibrating effect within his radius. He sounds the horn i=
n long intervals, like an eighteen wheeler barreling into the next truck st=
op. The horn's sound alone, mimics that of Optimus Prime.

Quickstride and =
Rat Trap hang out the windows with weapons in hand.

" I've been waitn' a l=
ong time for this! SO WHO'S GONNA RUN SCARED NOW HUH?!"

Rat Trap adds to t=
he excitement as he hangs out Tucson Prime's driver's side window.

"HERE C=
OMES THE CAVALRY! HEY, WHEELS, C'MON, WARNING SHOT, WARNING SHOT!"

Tucson =
Prime lines up his missile cannons for a warning ground shot, just a few mi=
les away from the fortress, hoping that hitting the ground will be enough t=
o grab Hydra's attention. He fires one missile at the ground, and then anot=
her, hitting the land around it from in front and landing a missile which a=
ppears to be guided, in back of the fortress, shaking up more than just the=
 ground.

Rat Trap dances in place.

"WHOO, HOOO! THAT'S WHAT I CALL A WARN=
ING SHOT!"

Tucson doesn't say much, but now comes very close to the base.
=

"Guys, I have to let you off here, no offense."

The maximals nodd as they=
 disembarch from Tucson Prime's cab and no sooner do they get out, he trans=
forms into robot mode. He stands outside, with missile chambers still smoki=
ng from the warning shots. As he's transformed, the missile chambers appear=
 to be attatched to his arms, which meant he could fire those at will if he=
 wanted to. Yet, he refrains as Optimus Prime would have done. Rat Trap and=
 Quickstride remain close, waiting for his next command.

" We wait here, I=
'm sure someone is going to want to come out and investigate the premisis."=


He looks to a crater he had just left behind by the firing of the warning=
 shot to the ground. He knew they'd come, it was only a matter of when. In =
the mean time he transmits to Lord Elder.

"Lord Elder, I'm at the dark for=
tress now. If you see Kup, tell him to proceed with caution and remain behi=
nd me, in case I need backup. I don't want him risking his spark on my acco=
unt. I started this, I need to finish it."

He looks to Rat Trap and Quicks=
tride.

"You two, I'll need you out here for diversionary tactics duty. The=
 more of a distraction you guys can muster, the better a chance we have of =
getting Nightshift out of here in one piece."

They salute and do as told. =
Tucson waits, standing strong, as the sun shimmers off his silver armor. He=
 takes the time to think, and on his mind, even more so than bringing Hydra=
s to Justice, was the fact that Cyclonus had to pay for his crimes against =
Rodimus. He had stolen the energy of his matrix, taken a power that did not=
 belong to him, and Tucson Prime knew he was NOT going to stand for it. He =
grits his teeth, the anger was just too much to keep in. He stares angrilly=
 at the black fortress and then out of nowhere, with a voice as powerful as=
 Optimus Prime's..

"CYCLONUS!"

His voice thunders like a high magnitude q=
uake.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> w=
rote:
>
> Who: SCOURGE, SCORPONOK - Hydras, Nightshift
> Location: Black Fo=
rtress - Hydras' Throne Room
> 
> > Hydras Hissed in Pain and taking his gu=
n he opened fireagainst Nightshift, he yelled "With the exception of the le=
adership, I'll grant one wish to the predacon that kill this SCUM and I'll =
promote him to the second in command rank!!!!"
> 
> Scorponok groaned as th=
e attack from Nightshift struck home! Scorponok
> was not the most agile of=
 soldiers and so for a moment his optic
> sensors were full of a spectacula=
r array of scintillating colors. The
> large Decepticon stepped back a pace=
 as he braced his arms on the door
> frame, his massive bulk now fully in t=
he middle of it rather than just
> in front of it.
> 
> "Cursed Autobot!" h=
e raged, his autocannons moving back and forth.
> They appeared ready to fi=
re, but without his optics to guide them they
> moved aimlessly.
> 
> Scour=
ge, who had up to this point had his own weapons lock on
> Nightshift, step=
ped away from the wall and towards the center of the
> room, although still=
 out of immediate melee range. "feisty" he said as
> a cold smile curled it=
self across his lips, "that won't last long."
> 
> Scourge fired his stunne=
r beams at Nightshift!
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>
